title: Professional Development-Oriented Engineering Education Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of engineering fundamentals and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in offline classrooms for practicing professionals, emphasizing activities implementable in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three professional development strategies for solving real-world engineering problems.
Learners perform complex engineering design tasks with at least 80% completeness through collaborative problem-solving activities.
Learners regularly diagnose their professional development level and establish improvement plans through reflective practice.

resources: Low-Cost Engineering Kit for Practical Training
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
